content: this legal text is about a case in the court of appeal in naples italy the case involves a disputed inheritance and the court has issued a judgment regarding the division of the property the judgment has been appealed but the court has rejected the appeal on various grounds the court has made corrections to the judgment and adjusted the costs of the case in another case involving parental authority over a minor child the court partially accepted the appeal and ordered one party to pay a sum of money to the other party the court also dismissed a request for compensation for unlawful employment and determined that the costs of the courtappointed expert should be split between the parties the final decision was made on january 10 2023 by the councilor est dr dr president
